long_description: The Tubbs Flex Jr. snowshoes, for 6- to 10-year-old girls, are a sure cure for cabin fever. Traction rails with rounded corners offer go-anywhere grip and simple bindings let her take control. Bindings are simple to use and lock tight around boots for all-day stability and control. Carbon steel instep crampons maximize weighted traction for better grip and responsiveness; curved traction rails ensure superior side-hill grip in hard or icy conditions. Flex Tails absorb shock from the heel strike and allow snowshoes to have a more natural stride from heels to toes, reducing the amount of stress on joints. Decks feature torsional flex that allows traction elements to stay in contact with the snow on uneven terrain. Molded snow brakes in the deck's strike zone improve weighted traction. Tubbs Flex Jr. snowshoes are designed to shed snow off the tails so there's less work involved; rotation limiters prevent forward over-rotation. In powder conditions, Flex Jr. snowshoes are best for kids 40 - 90 lbs.; in packed or variable snow conditions they're appropriate for all weights; they measure 17 x 7 in.
short_description: The Tubbs Flex Jr. snowshoes, for 6- to 10-year-old girls, are a sure cure for cabin fever. Traction rails with rounded corners offer go-anywhere grip and simple bindings let her take control.
